types.description: LSM303DLHC magnetometer input node. This device also has an accelerometer, check for its node. After each tick in its TICK port, a new reading is output on each of its output ports.

in_ports.description: Packets sent in here will trigger a magnetometer reading and produce packets on the output ports.
in_ports.name: TICK

types.name: magnetometer/lsm303

members.description: I2C bus slave on which the magnetometer answers.
members.name: i2c_slave

members.description: Scale selection (in Gauss). Ranges from -value to +value. Must be one of 1.3, 1.9, 2.5, 4.0, 4.7, 5,6 or 8.1.
members.name: scale

out_ports.description: Magnetic field in all X/Y/Z axes, in Gauss
out_ports.name: OUT
